alert.note: Alert for Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 1:49AM MST until January 11 at 4:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 65 below zero. * WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM MST early this morning. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 AM early this morning to 11 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
